verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What a friend we have in Jesus, All our sins and griefs to bear! What a privilege to carry everything to God in prayer! O what peace we often forfeit, O what needless pain we bare, All because we do not carry Everything to God in prayer.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Have we trials and temptations? Is there trouble anywhere? We should never be discouraged, Take it to the Lord in prayer. Can we find a friend so faithful? Who will all our sorrows share? Jesus knows our every weakness, Take it to the Lord in prayer.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Are we weak and heavy laden, Cumbered with a load of care? Precious Savior, still our refuge, Take it to the Lord in prayer. Do thy friends despise, forsake thee? Take it to the Lord in prayer; In His arms Heâ€™ll take and shield thee, Thou wilt find a solace there.{/lang-eng}
